title: your account is in the process of transferring.
body:
"Your account is in the process of transferring. please try again in a few minutes. if the issue persists, contact player support" Appeared on my client so I logged in the website and created a Ticket #31710989 (that I can no longer access since I changed the password) and now cannot even login to the website,

Changing  the password made it worse since now I cannot login in my main account. Funny thing is I filled a recovery account ticket and to check its status I need to login to the account. Ticket #31711393

If any rioter sees this please advise on how can I access the tickets without logging into my account that at the moment I can no longer access.

replies.body: It looks like a normal ticket was submitted for this, which would require a login.  Fill out an [account recovery form](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416) instead, and we'll be able to help you directly with the transfer.  Sorry for the confusion!
